item.title: Shopping Cart System
item.description: Used Spring Boot to create a simple shopping cart system, which includes:Account securityEntities, DAOs, and models for CRUD operations in MySQLBeans for Dependency Injection and Inverse of ControlForm validatorsThymeleaf
